item.title:
(My Local Feed) $AAPL - Morgan Stanley Raises Apple Price Target to $235
Morgan Stanley analyst Erik Woodring raised Appleâ€™s price target to $235 from $220, maintaining an Overweight rating.
The firm expects March quarter results and June guidance to slightly beat estimates, though June margins may face pressure from tariffs. Forecasts include $95.7B in revenue and $1.64 EPS, driven by early product demand, a weaker dollar, and 12% Services growth.
item.description:
$AAPL - Morgan Stanley Raises Apple Price Target to $235

Morgan Stanley analyst Erik Woodring raised Appleâ€™s price target to $235 from $220, maintaining an Overweight rating.

The firm expects March quarter results and June guidance to slightly beat estimates, though June margins may face pressure from tariffs. Forecasts include $95.7B in revenue and $1.64 EPS, driven by early product demand, a weaker dollar, and 12% Services growth.
